Super.title: Super Authority
Super.description: The super administrator has full authority on the business profile.

member.title: Member
member.description: The member can only see his/her own information in the business profile.

user_remove.title: User Deletion
user_remove.description: With this authorization, the user can be deleted in the business profile.

user_perm_add.title: Adding User Authorization
user_perm_add.description: With this authorization, authorization can be added to any user in the business profile.

user_perm_remove.title: Delete User Authorization
user_perm_remove.description: With this authorization, authorization can be deleted from any user in the business profile.

enable.title: Activation
enable.description: With this authorization, the business profile can be activated.

disable.title: Inactivation
disable.description: With this authorization, the business profile can be disabled.

user_list.title: User Listing
user_list.description: With this authorization, the user list can be displayed in the business profile.

invite_create.title: Creating Invitation
invite_create.description: With this authority, an invitation can be created in the business profile to invite other users to the business profile.

invite_delete.title: Deleting Invitation
invite_delete.description: With this authority, the invitation can be deleted in the business profile.

invite_view.title: Viewing Invitation
invite_view.description: With this authorization, invitations can be displayed in the business profile.

Super.title: Super Authority
Super.description: The super administrator has full authority on the listing/advertisement profile.

create.title: Creating a Listing/Advertisement
create.description: With this authority, a listing/advertisement can be created in the listing/advertisement profile.

update.title: Listing/Ad Update
update.description: With this authorization, the listing/advertisement can be updated in the listing/advertisement profile.

delete.title: Delete Listing/Ad
delete.description: With this authority, the listing/advertisement can be deleted in the listing/advertisement profile.

enable.title: Activation
enable.description: With this authorization, the listing/advertisement can be activated in the listing/advertisement profile.

disable.title: Inactivation
disable.description: With this authority, the listing/advertisement can be deactivated in the listing/advertisement profile.

reorder.title: Sorting
reorder.description: With this authority, the listing/advertisement order can be changed in the listing/advertisement profile.

restore.title: Restore
restore.description: With this authority, a deleted listing/advertisement in the listing/advertisement profile can be restored.

list.title: Listing
list.description: With this authorization, the listing/advertisement list can be displayed in the listing/advertisement profile.

view.title: Views
view.description: With this authorization, listing/advertisement details can be viewed in the listing/advertisement profile.

Super.title: Super Authority
Super.description: The super administrator has full authority on the listing/advertisement log profile.

view.title: Views
view.description: With this authorization, the listing/advertisement log profile can be viewed.

count.title: Counting
count.description: With this authority, counting can be done in the listing/advertisement log profile.

Super.title: Super Authority
Super.description: The super administrator has full authority on the business log profile.

view.title: Views
view.description: With this authorization, the business log profile can be viewed.

count.title: Counting
count.description: With this authority, counting can be done in the business log profile.
